articles.author: Ellen O'Riordan
articles.title: Tributes paid to talented horse rider (15) who died following training accident - The Irish Times
articles.description: Tiggy Hancock won a team medal at the European Championships in 2019
articles.content:
Tributes have been paid to a 15-year-old Carlow girl who died at an equestrian centre in Dublin on Wednesday.
Tiggy Hancock, from Bagenalstown, suffered serious injuries during a training session at… [+1860 chars]

articles.author: AP
articles.title: Joe Biden in Europe: Takeaways from G7, NATO and Geneva summit with Vladimir Putin - The Indian Express
articles.description: Joe Biden's eight-day, three-country foreign trip demonstrated his emphasis on personal relationships above all. "There's no substitute for face-to-face dialogue between leaders. None," Biden said.
articles.content: President Joe Biden’s first overseas trip put his diplomatic and negotiating philosophy on display, as he rallied traditional US democratic allies to confront new and old challenges and offered an of… [+7282 chars]
